alert.note: Alert for Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 24 at 4:30PM EDT until July 24 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM EDT FOR WEST CENTRAL AROOSTOOK COUNTY... At 429 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Nine-mile Bridge, or 8 miles southeast of Lac Frontiere, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Saint Pamphile and Nine-mile Bridge. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A severe thunderstorm has some potential for producing a tornado although forecaster confidence is not high enough to issue a tornado warning. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
